title: The Pudding is hiring for Polygraph, our in-house brand creative agency
description: The Pudding’s in-house brand creative agency, Polygraph, is hiring a full-time creator (part engineer, designer, and journalist) to work on paid projects. The job is to work with other organizations to tell visual, data-led stories, which you’ll design and code.
